00013 FileNameLineEdit::FileNameLineEdit(QWidget *parent, 
00014                                                                    const QFileInfo& baseLocation, 
00015                                                                    const QString& contents ):
00016 QLineEdit(contents, parent), baseLocation_(baseLocation) {
00017 
00018         setToolTip(tr("Click here to select a file to add"));
00019 }

00025 void FileNameLineEdit::mousePressEvent( QMouseEvent * e ) {
00026 
00027         // event is handled only if the left mouse button was pressed
00028         if (e->button() != Qt::LeftButton) {
00029                 e->ignore();
00030                 return;
00031         }
00032 
00033         // accept the event so it wont be passed to parent
00034         e->accept();
00035 
00036         QString file = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName(this, 
00037                 tr("Select a file"), baseLocation_.absolutePath(), QString(), 0,
00038                 QFileDialog::ReadOnly);
00039 
00040         // if no file was selected
00041         if (file.isEmpty()) {
00042                 return;
00043         }
00044 
00045         // create QDir instance to match the base location
00046         QDir baseDir(baseLocation_.absoluteDir());
00047 
00048         // create the relative path
00049         QString relPath = QDir::cleanPath(baseDir.relativeFilePath(file));
00050 
00051         // set the relative path to the lineEdit
00052         setText(relPath);
00053 }
00054 
00055 bool FileNameLineEdit::isValid() const {
00056         // the name can't be empty, it must contain a path to a file.
00057         return !text().isEmpty();
00058 }
